full_story: Once upon a time in the lively town of Bedrock, Fred and his best friend Barney were buzzing with excitement about a costume contest at the Water Buffalo Lodge! “Let’s be devils, Barney!” Fred shouted, his voice booming with enthusiasm. Barney grinned, his eyes sparkling, “That sounds fun, Fred!” They hurried to get their red capes and pointy horns. But when they started play-fighting in their costumes, they made such a ruckus that the police came to check on them! “What’s all this noise?” Officer Pebble asked, raising an eyebrow. Meanwhile, a new band called the Way-Outs was playing on the radio, announcing that Bedrock was being invaded by space aliens! Pebbles, Fred’s adorable daughter, jumped up and down in excitement, “Wow! Aliens are coming, Daddy!” Fred had an idea. “Barney, why don’t you stay as the devil, and I’ll be a space alien!” Barney nodded eagerly, “Okay, Fred!” Fred put on a shiny silver outfit and a big, silly helmet. As he strutted down the street, everyone pointed and gasped, thinking he really was an alien! Suddenly, there was a big commotion when Fred accidentally bumped into Mr. Slate, his boss. “Watch it, Fred!” Mr. Slate said, looking stern but then chuckling when he saw the silly costume. Just then, the police, having received lots of calls about the “alien,” arrived at the contest. Officer Pebble said, “Let’s clear this up!” The radio DJ, scared of the police, admitted it was all a joke about the Way-Outs. The townsfolk laughed, and Fred was awarded a shiny trophy for the best costume! “Hooray for Fred!” cheered Wilma, while Betty clapped for Barney. And as the Way-Outs played a happy tune, Fred danced and sang with them, showing everyone that sometimes a little mix-up can lead to great fun!

global_characters_dict.Betty: Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Slate: Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.

A police car with flashing lights parked prominently in the foreground along with a comical alien figure which could be a person in an outlandish costume adding to the chaos of the scene. Betty is standing with her hands on her hips looking incredulous; Barney is scratching his head in confusion and Fred is pointing towards the police car with a surprised expression. Bettys face shows a mix of disbelief and annoyance Barney looks puzzled and slightly worried while Fred appears excited and animated as if he cant believe what he’s seeing. Betty is on the left side of the image Barney is in the center and Fred is on the right side all three characters are in the foreground creating a triangular composition that draws the viewers eye. The setting is a suburban street with a few houses in the background. The sky is clear and the street is lined with trees giving a sense of normalcy contrasted with the unusual event occurring. Wide shot capturing the full scene with the police car the characters and the surrounding neighborhood emphasizing the humorous chaos of the situation.

captions_info.caption: Officer Pebble declared, “Let’s clear this up!” as the radio DJ admitted it was all a joke about the Way-Outs.
captions_info.description: Pebbles. Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot. Slate. Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.A lively scene depicting Officer Pebbles confidently addressing a group with a playful atmosphere as the radio DJ humorously admits to a joke involving the Way-Outs. A radio set is present possibly on a table or in the DJs booth with colorful buttons and dials symbolizing the source of the joke. Officer Pebbles is wearing a police badge and uniform emphasizing her authority. Officer Pebbles is standing tall with one hand raised gesturing assertively as she speaks. Slate who is nearby is looking at her with a smile clearly amused by the situation. Officer Pebbles has a determined yet playful expression showcasing her confidence and readiness to handle the situation. Slate appears amused and relaxed enjoying the lightheartedness of the moment. Officer Pebbles is in the foreground slightly to the left commanding attention with her stance. Slate is positioned to the right slightly behind her leaning in with an interested expression. The setting is a vibrant radio station studio filled with colorful posters and sound equipment. The atmosphere is cheerful and lively reflecting the playful nature of the joke being discussed. Medium shot capturing both Officer Pebbles and Slate allowing for a clear view of their expressions and the surrounding details of the radio station.

captions_info.caption: The townsfolk laughed, and Fred was awarded a shiny trophy for the best costume!

His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Freds face is beaming with pride and happiness his eyes sparkling with joy as he basks in the applause of the crowd. He has a big smile that reflects his excitement and accomplishment. Medium shot capturing Fred from the waist up along with the surrounding townsfolk showcasing the trophy and the joyful atmosphere of the celebration.

captions_info.caption: “Hooray for Fred!” cheered Wilma, while Betty clapped for Barney, celebrating their fun adventure.
